# This Python 3 environment comes with many helpful analytics libraries installed
# It is defined by the kaggle/python Docker image: https://github.com/kaggle/docker-python
# For example, here's several helpful packages to load

import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

# You can write up to 20GB to the current directory (/kaggle/working/) that gets preserved as output when you create a version using "Save & Run All" 
# You can also write temporary files to /kaggle/temp/, but they won't be saved outside of the current session

fig = go.Figure()
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=fra_vac['date'], y=fra_vac['daily_vaccinations'], mode='lines+markers', name='France'))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=uk_vac['date'],y=uk_vac['daily_vaccinations'], mode='lines+markers', name='UK'))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=ger_vac['date'],y=ger_vac['daily_vaccinations'], mode='lines+markers', name='Germany'))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=ita_vac['date'],y=ita_vac['daily_vaccinations'], mode='lines+markers', name='Italy'))
fig.update_layout(title='Comparison of Daily Vaccinations')
fig.show()

source.a3005d0b:
pfizer = vac_mac[vac_mac['vaccine'] == 'Pfizer/BioNTech'].sort_values('total_vaccinations',ascending=False)[:10]
moderna = vac_mac[vac_mac['vaccine'] == 'Moderna'].sort_values('total_vaccinations',ascending=False)[:10]
oxford_astrazeneca = vac_mac[vac_mac['vaccine'] == 'Oxford/AstraZeneca'].sort_values('total_vaccinations',ascending=False)[:10]
JJ = vac_mac[vac_mac['vaccine'] == 'Johnson&Johnson'].sort_values('total_vaccinations',ascending=False)[:10]
source.0193820f:
usa_pfizer= pfizer[pfizer['location'] == 'United States']
usa_moderna = moderna[moderna['location'] == 'United States']
usa_JJ = JJ[JJ['location'] == 'United States']

ger_pfizer= pfizer[pfizer['location'] == 'Germany']
ger_moderna= moderna[moderna['location'] == 'Germany']
ger_JJ= JJ[JJ['location'] == 'Germany']
ger_oxford= oxford_astrazeneca[oxford_astrazeneca['location'] == 'Germany']

fra_pfizer= pfizer[pfizer['location'] == 'France']
fra_moderna= moderna[moderna['location'] == 'France']
fra_JJ= JJ[JJ['location'] == 'France']
fra_oxford= oxford_astrazeneca[oxford_astrazeneca['location'] == 'France']

ita_pfizer= pfizer[pfizer['location'] == 'Italy']
ita_moderna= moderna[moderna['location'] == 'Italy']
ita_JJ= JJ[JJ['location'] == 'Italy']
ita_oxford= oxford_astrazeneca[oxford_astrazeneca['location'] == 'Italy']

spa_pfizer= pfizer[pfizer['location'] == 'Spain']
spa_moderna= moderna[moderna['location'] == 'Spain']
spa_JJ= JJ[JJ['location'] == 'Spain']
spa_oxford= oxford_astrazeneca[oxford_astrazeneca['location'] == 'Spain']

jpn_pfizer= pfizer[pfizer['location'] == 'Japan']
jpn_moderna= moderna[moderna['location'] == 'Japan']
jpn_JJ= JJ[JJ['location'] == 'Japan']
jpn_oxford= oxford_astrazeneca[oxford_astrazeneca['location'] == 'Japan']
